description:
Kanzaki Akane was casted for the lead role of the movie "Hiiragi no Toki"; she had dream of this role since her childhood but turns out being unable to perform when http://anidb.net/ch5896 [Sannou Yoriko] is on the set, much to the dismay of http://anidb.net/ch40718 [her manager].
That`s because http://anidb.net/ch40680 [Sarasvati] uses her power to crush Akane`s morale in order to become the star of this movie herself.
name: Kanzaki Akane
